transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Yes
Customer: Mam main bol raha hun mera account close karna hai mam.
Executive: Kaun baat kar raha hai?
Customer: Incubate R work se baat kar raha hun.
Executive: R work MK R work acha jo aapko south mein apna company nahi dikhana tha wo
Customer: Haan haan haan haan haan.
Executive: Sir account close karna hai aapko sir issue kya hai matlab mat uthaiyega buyleads vagaira
Customer: Nahi mam aap mera Ankit se baat hua hai bola mera dikkat ho raha hai isliye main account close karna chahti hun mam bola is number pe phone karke complaint jana do wo complaint Ankit Rawat kaun hai?
Customer: Haan?
Executive: Ankit Rawat aapke sales person hai kya jinne aapko ye diya tha account manager hai account manager hai mera account khula tha Nasim.
Executive: Account manager to main hun na sir aapki Nancy
Customer: Acha acha abhi kis se baat hua abhi wo aaya ek minute
Executive: Ankit ek minute rukiye Ankit Rawat ye production team hai na jo aapka catalog design kar rahi hai unka aaya hoga call
Customer: Wahi hoga shayad wo mere ko bola is number pe aapko call kiye honge product edition ke liye ya material ke liye wo aapko call kiye honge
Executive: Hai na to kya matlab
(silence)
Executive: The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold please stay on the line aapne jis vyakti
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan mam mera account close karna hai isliye aapko phone kiya
Executive: Nahi aap mujhe batao Nasim ne aapko kya bola tha kyu account close karna hai ye recorded line hai sir aap bataoge tabhi main kuch kar paungi
Customer: Mam Nasim ne mere ko bola tha aapka Chennai mein account dikhega hi nahi.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Aisa bol ke account khola tha mam theek hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Aisa bol ke koi account khol ke uske baad bhi dikha dikh jata hai wo mera party ko pata chal gaya isliye mera dikkat aa gaya mam.
Executive: Hmm acha matlab aapko south mein aapki pehle se personal koi problem hai
Customer: Haan main isliye Nasim bhai ko bola tha bar bar request kiya mere ko jo nahi dikhega nahi dikhega
Executive: Acha acha theek hai main apne manager ko call transfer kar rahi hun sir
Customer: Theek hai call transfer kariye
Executive: 9696 pe call hai
(silence)
Executive: Main recorded line pe nahi bol sakti possible to nahi refund possible hai main nahi bol sakti recorded line pe
Customer: Hello
Executive: Theek hai sir main ek kaam karti hun hello
Customer: Haan boliye
Executive: Meri manager aapko call karengi theek hai main update kar deti hun yahan pe kyuki sir mere end se to main update hi kar sakti hun mere manager jab tak confirmation nahi lengi tab tak kuch nahi ho payega to dekhte hain kya ho sakta hai
Customer: Theek hai
Customer: Haan
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to close account due to visibility issues.

- Account should not be visible in Chennai.



Resolution:

- Executive explained about production team call.

- Executive will transfer call to manager.



Next Steps: 

- Manager will call the customer.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, account closure, visibility, chennai
